name: Souten Returns
text: Target 1 "Souten" monster in your GY; Special Summon it, then, if you Special Summoned a "Souten" monster with an original Level of 4 or lower by this effect, you can Special Summon 1 "Souten Spirit Token" (Warrior/LIGHT/Level 2/ATK 0/DEF 0). You can only activate 1 "Souten Returns" per turn.
